live_updates: This issue has been resolved.  Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
42480.summary: Some customers in the Fort McMurray are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
42480.title: Oct 1 – Fort McMurray | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

live_updates: Services in the area have been restored. Thank you for your patience.
Technicians are still on site working to resolve this as soon as possible.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
42482.summary: Some customers in the Lower Townsite area of Fort McMurray are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
42482.title: Oct 1 – Fort McMurray (Lower Townsite) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
